description: The anticipated action comes after the FBI searched President Biden's Delaware vacation home Wednesday.
author: USA TODAY, Sarah Elbeshbishi, USA TODAY

title: Biden, Trump documents: Lawmakers on intelligence committees demand right to review
description: The Deptartment of Justice which has appointed two separate special counsels related to the documents is so far withholding them from Congress.
author: USA TODAY, Ken Tran, USA TODAY

title: Republicans want to dump Trump. Will they rally behind a 2024 alternative fast enough?
description: Republicans risk failing to consolidate around another candidate fast enough and winding up with Donald Trump as their presidential nominee again.
author: USA TODAY, Francesca Chambers, USA TODAY

title: 'We're here:' Donald Trump hits the campaign trail again in New Hampshire, South Carolina
description: After two months of turmoil, the former president who is running again in 2024 resumes campaigning with events in New Hampshire and South Carolina.
author: USA TODAY, David Jackson, USA TODAY

title: Shoot it? Snare it? Maneuver it back to China? US officials wring hands over options for spy balloon
description: Among the many lingering questions about a Chinese spy balloon is why it's in U.S. airspace and why now.
author: USA TODAY, Josh Meyer, Maureen Groppe and Tom Vanden Brook, USA TODAY

title: 'SNL': Merrick Garland, FBI agents search Pence, Obama's houses for classified documents
description: Democrat and Republican politicians alike, beware: If you've taken classified documents, United States Attorney General Merrick Garland will find you.
author: USA TODAY, Charles Trepany, USA TODAY

title: Jim Jordan Says It’s Not His Job to Stop ‘Evil’ Like Cops Killing Tyre Nichols
description: “I don't know that there's any law that can stop that evil that we saw,” Republican Rep. Jim Jordan said in response to Tyre Nichols’ death.
author: Paul Blest, Leah Feiger
